name: Sweetaholic
description:
"This is the Kingdom of Sweets.

Where the evil Chocolate Queen Rules.

We are one of the failures from her chocolate summoning ritual, 

thrown like garbage to the outskirt of the kingdom.

Do you want to work together so we can go home?" 

Accepting her invitation, you two began your journey on the Kingdom of Sweets.

---

Sweetaholic is a 2D game platformer created by World Domination, a group of 2 from Binus University.

To play this game, all you need is a keyboard!

Warning!

This game is still unpolished and buggy, so please don't be shy to send us feedback about your journey in the Kingdom of Sweets to worlddominationawa@gmail.com.
